content:
Hey!
I submitted this PR recently and would welcome any review/feedback. Thanks!
Sorry, but why was that PR closed? generally it looks reasonable (I don't know anything about coarse geometry so I cannot judge the content)
It was closed by the author, not by a maintainer. Maybe it is superseded by another PR?
No, @Rémi Bottinelli didn't open any other PR. I'm assuming it's simply work in progress.

@Moritz Doll I figured it was maybe a bit low on content, and I was too eager/pushy to get things merged, so I closed it for the time being. If it's to be opened again and merged, I think I'd like to replace \Rge0 by \R and possibly pseudo_emetric by pseudo_metric. It seems \Rge0 is more of a burden than anything else, and all proofs go pretty much the same way with \R.
I would not worry about the amount of content too much, some things that are one line in any textbook become rather long in mathlib and it is also easier to review shorter PRs.
@Moritz Doll OK, I've reopened the PR with minor changes. I thought since it was there I should as well try and get it merged!
